content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”About Course” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Rapid technological advances in Data Science have been reshaping global businesses and putting performances on overdrive. As yet, companies are able to capture only a fraction of the potential locked in data, and data scientists who are able to reimagine business models by working with Python are in great demand.
Python is one of the most popular programming languages for high-level data processing, due to its simple syntax, easy readability, and easy comprehension. Python’s learning curve is low, and due to its many data structures, classes, nested functions, and iterators, besides the extensive libraries, this language is the first choice of data scientists for analyzing, extracting information and making informed business decisions through big data.

Course Outline

Week 1: Python Programming

Week 2: Variables and Data Types

Week 3 Looping Constructs

Week 4: Data Structure

Week 5: Functions & Methods

Week 6: Object-Oriented Programming(OOP)

Week 7: Django

Week 8: Database

Week 9: Data Science Libraries

Week 10: Data Science Libraries & Analytics

Week 11: Data visualization

Week 12: Projects presentation & Graduation[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Pre-requisite and Preparations” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • A computer on which you can install software (Windows, or MacOS)
  • Willingness to learn.
  • Work hard to build a career in tech.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1572532215297{background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Details” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Date: 17th January 2022

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Duration: 3 Months

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Time: 3 Hours / Session

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Venue: Online

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Price: ₦300,000[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
